name: prolong
label: Prolonged IDP (displaced between 6 months and 2 years)

name: economic
label: Economic migrants (those moving in order to find work)

name: intimidate
label: Intimidation and harassment by host community/local authorities

name: land_dispute
label: Land dispute forced them off land / shelter

name: join_family
label: Moving to be with family / friends

name: better_security
label: Better security where they are moving

name: better_service
label: Better access to services where they are moving

name: masks_ifsick
label: Wear masks and gloves if experiencing symptoms

name: masks
label: Wear masks and gloves in general

name: stay_home
label: Stay home but still interact with household members

name: speak_leader
label: Speak to a religious or community leader

name: pharm_hosp
label: Go to a pharmacy, doctors office or hospital

name: trad_healer
label: Go to a traditional / local healer

name: none
label: Nothing, continue daily life as normal

name: denied_finance
label: Denied financial means and access to employment

name: denied_services
label: Denied access to basic services i.e. education or healthcare

name: harrass_verbal
label: Experienced harassment and VERBAL abuse in public

name: harass_physical
label: Experienced harassment and PHYSICAL abuse in public

name: country_return
label: Yes, based on country from which they returned

name: health
label: Yes, based on health condition (showing cough, fever or other coronavirus symptoms)

name: low_capacity
label: Waterpoint has low capacity (runs out of water often)

name: expensive
label: Cost is prohibitive i.e. water trucking

name: longer_wait
label: Longer wait times to access waterpoint

name: shorter_wait
label: Shorter wait times to access waterpoint

name: lower_capacity
label: Waterpoint runs out of water faster than before

name: no_further
label: No, further than 2 km but inside the city/village

name: no_none
label: No, none accessible for this settlement population

name: hours
label: Health service opening hours not convenient

name: staff_behave
label: Health service staff behaviour is bad

name: hours
label: Health service opening hours not convenient

name: staff_behave
label: Health service staff behaviour is bad

name: very_good
label: Very good (Completely stable situation and no criminality or conflict)

name: good
label: Good (Stable situation and people are feeling safe. Only criminality but no conflict)

name: neutral
label: Okay (Situation is good but can change at any time - unstable)

name: poor_qual
label: Poor (Suicide attack, demonstration, explosion, but existence of some safer location. People are in danger from one party)

name: very_poor
label: Very poor (Ongoing fights, mines/explosions. People are in danger from both parties)

name: no_change
label: No change in number of incidents

name: culture_barrier
label: Socio-cultural barriers between settlement members and host community

name: physical_ache
label: Multiple unexplained physical complaints (headaches, stomach pains etc.)

name: substance
label: Increased substance intake (e.g. drugs, alcohol etc)

name: comm_leader
label: Emotional support from religious or community leaders

name: clinical
label: Clinical mental health support (psychiatric – medication for mental health issues)

name: referrals
label: Referrals to mental health services by HFs/NGOs

name: staff_behave
label: Health service staff behaviour is bad

name: no_ngo_access
label: Lack of access for NGOs to provide services

name: none
label: Nothing, continue daily life as normal

name: collective
label: Collective centre (building not intended for living)

name: hosted
label: Hosted in shelter by friends/family for free

name: free_permiss
label: Staying in shelter for free WITH owner's consent

name: free_no_permiss
label: Staying in shelter for free WITHOUT owner's consent

name: deed
label: Land title deed issued by Court of Law

name: letter
label: Letter of permission from Government Authorities

name: tools
label: Tools and materials (in cash/ in kind) to rapidly extend shelters to accommodate the sick

name: tent
label: Provision of tents to accommodate sick persons inside the site

name: relocate
label: Relocation of unsick family members to other relatives

name: temp_ward
label: Construction of a large temporary shelter (plastic tarpaulin, plywood, etc.) for 15-30 people to accommodate all sick individuals within the settlement

name: rent_isolate
label: Renting of hotel/hostel to isolate sick individuals for 14 days

name: shelter_repair
label: Shelter repair support to upgrade and repair settlement shelters

name: business
label: Small business / sale of goods or services

name: sold_out
label: No, the market is sold out

name: hygiene
label: Hand sanitizer and other hygiene materials

name: construct_mat
label: Construction materials (wood, nails, cement bricks, glass, etc)

name: market_inside
label: Purchase in markets inside the settlement

name: market_outsided
label: Purchase in markets outside the settlement

name: family
label: Provided from family and friends in the area

name: mixed
label: Population is mixed with migrants and host community

name: info_hh
label: Information on the coronavirus preventive measures at HOUSEHOLD level

name: info_comm
label: Information on the coronavirus preventive measures at COMMUNITY level

name: part
label: Yes, some residents but not all

name: other_facility
label: Yes, classes in other facilities (mosques, community centre, etc)

name: lower_risk
label: Lower risk of secondary impacts (vulnerability and needs) due to covid-19

name: moderate_risk
label: Moderate risk of secondary impacts (vulnerability and needs) due to covid-19

name: moderate_high_risk
label: Moderate-high risk of secondary impacts (vulnerability and needs) due to covid-19

name: higher_risk
label: Higher risk of secondary impacts (vulnerability and needs) due to covid-19
